name: TrendexplorerbyTRENDONE
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trend one
des:
The Trendexplorer Skill by Trendone inspires you with worldwide trends and innovations. These can be intelligent technologies, pioneering products, new marketing and media innovations, or successful startups. More than 25,000 of these micro-trends are available to our clients in the Trendexplorer.
 
Just ask Alexa: „Alexa, ask TRENDONE for inspiration “ and Alexa presents a selected micro-trend from the TRENDONE Trendexplorer – the online tool filled with trends and innovations. 

A trend scouting network with roughly eighty trend scouts in 22 language regions detects new trend signals for TRENDONE every single day. The innovation analysts from TRENDONE filter out the most promising and start with these specific, marketable innovations. 
 
For the free version of the Trendexplorer Skill you won’t need an account. You can find further information on the functions and content of the premium version of the Trendexplorer here: https://www.trendexplorer.com/en/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy (German, DE)
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
